#summary sockperf was developed in Voltaire.  Now part of Mellanox.


= Details =

sockperf is based on udp_lat that was developed by the VMA team at Voltaire.  
udp_lat was able to measure average latency in ping-pong test for UDP traffic.

sockperf_v1 was developed by Avner BenHanoch
sockperf_v2 was mainly developed by Igor Ivanov.
